channel.title: CMake on Arif Ahmed
channel.description: Recent content in CMake on Arif Ahmed

item.title: Google Summer of Code 2018 with CERN-HSF
item.description: Evaluated the dependencies of the TMath Functions already available in ROOT. Added a vectorized implementation of the ROOT::TMath functions in VecCore. Benchmarked performance in different architectures and instruction sets. Integrated the new VecCore implementations in ROOT and added benchmarks. Major Commit for ROOT Merged PR for ROOT benchmarks Minor Commits for VecCore
